verses.verse: And it came to pass, when men<WH120> began<WH2490> to multiply<WH7231> on<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>, and daughters<WH1323> were born<WH3205> unto them,
That the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> saw<WH7200> the daughters<WH1323> of men<WH120> that they<WH2007> were fair<WH2896>; and they took<WH3947> them wives<WH802> of all which they chose<WH977>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559>, My spirit<WH7307> shall not always<WH5769> strive<WH1777> with man<WH120>, for that he also<WH1571> is flesh<WH1320><WH7683>: yet his days<WH3117> shall be an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141>.

There were giants<WH5303> in the earth<WH776> in those days<WH3117>; and also after<WH310> that<WH3651>, when<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> came in<WH935> unto the daughters<WH1323> of men<WH120>, and they bare<WH3205> children to them, the same<WH1992> became mighty men<WH1368> which were of old<WH5769>, men<WH582> of renown<WH8034>.

¶ And GOD<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that the wickedness<WH7451> of man<WH120> was great<WH7227> in the earth<WH776>, and that every imagination<WH3336> of the thoughts<WH4284> of his heart<WH3820> was only<WH7535> evil<WH7451> continually<WH3117>.
And it repented<WH5162> the LORD<WH3068> that he had made<WH6213> man<WH120> on the earth<WH776>, and it grieved<WH6087> him at<WH413> his heart<WH3820>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559>, I will destroy<WH4229> man<WH120> whom I have created<WH1254> from the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>; both man<WH120>, and<WH5704> beast<WH929>, and the creeping thing<WH7431>, and the fowls<WH5775> of the air<WH8064>; for it repenteth<WH5162> me that I have made<WH6213> them.
But Noah<WH5146> found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in the eyes<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068>.
¶ These are the generations<WH8435> of Noah<WH5146>: Noah<WH5146> was a just<WH6662> man<WH376> and perfect<WH8549> in his generations<WH1755>, and Noah<WH5146> walked<WH1980> with God<WH430>.
And Noah<WH5146> begat<WH3205> three<WH7969> sons<WH1121>, Shem<WH8035>, Ham<WH2526>, and Japheth<WH3315>.
The earth<WH776> also was corrupt<WH7843> before<WH6440> God<WH430>, and the earth<WH776> was filled<WH4390> with violence<WH2555>.
And God<WH430> looked<WH7200> upon the earth<WH776>, and, behold, it was corrupt<WH7843>; for all flesh<WH1320> had corrupted<WH7843> his way<WH1870> upon the earth<WH776>.

And God<WH430> said<WH559> unto Noah<WH5146>, The end<WH7093> of all flesh<WH1320> is come<WH935> before me<WH6440>; for the earth<WH776> is filled with<WH4390> violence<WH2555> through them<WH6440>; and, behold, I will destroy<WH7843> them with<WH854> the earth<WH776>.

¶ Make<WH6213> thee an ark<WH8392> of gopher<WH1613> wood<WH6086>; rooms<WH7064> shalt thou make<WH6213> in<WH854> the ark<WH8392>, and shalt pitch<WH3722> it within<WH1004> and without<WH2351> with pitch<WH3724>.

And this is the fashion which thou shalt make<WH6213> it of: The length<WH753> of the ark<WH8392> shall be three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520>, the breadth<WH7341> of it fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520>, and the height<WH6967> of it thirty<WH7970> cubits<WH520>.

A window<WH6672> shalt thou make<WH6213> to the ark<WH8392>, and in a cubit<WH520> shalt thou finish<WH3615> it above<WH4605>; and the door<WH6607> of the ark<WH8392> shalt thou set<WH7760> in the side thereof<WH6654>; with lower<WH8482>, second<WH8145>, and third<WH7992> stories shalt thou make<WH6213> it.

And, behold<WH2009>, I<WH589>, even I, do bring<WH935> a flood<WH3999> of waters<WH4325> upon the earth<WH776>, to destroy<WH7843> all flesh<WH1320>, wherein is the breath<WH7307> of life<WH2416>, from under<WH8478> heaven<WH8064>; and every thing<WH3605> that is in the earth<WH776> shall die<WH1478>.

But with thee will I establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285>; and thou shalt come<WH935> into<WH413> the ark<WH8392>, thou<WH859>, and thy sons<WH1121>, and thy wife<WH802>, and thy sons'<WH1121> wives<WH802> with thee.

And of every living thing<WH2416> of all flesh<WH1320>, two<WH8147> of every sort shalt thou bring<WH935> into the ark<WH8392>, to keep them alive<WH2421> with thee; they shall be male<WH2145> and female<WH5347>.

Of fowls<WH5775> after their kind<WH4327>, and of cattle<WH929> after their kind<WH4327>, of every creeping thing<WH7431> of the earth<WH127> after his kind<WH4327>, two<WH8147> of every sort shall come<WH935> unto thee, to keep them alive<WH2421>.
And take<WH3947> thou unto thee of all food<WH3978> that is eaten<WH398>, and thou shalt gather<WH622> it to thee; and it shall be for food<WH402> for thee, and for them.
Thus did<WH6213> Noah<WH5146>; according to all that God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> him, so did<WH6213> he.
